blurbs.value:
- Once the reservation is completed, you must provide us 24-hour notice prior to your tour to cancel and receive a full refund
- If a cancellation is made within 24 hours of the tour a full charge for the activity will be made
- In the event that we cancel the activity, you will receive a full refund

A nighttime adventure awaits! Enjoy an unforgettable night with your family or friends in the brightest bioluminescent bay in the world. Watch the water glow with every stroke of your paddle from a seat in our completely clear kayaks.

- Enjoy one of the world's most surreal experiences as you glide through glowing waters
- Take in the natural beauty of the brightest bioluminescent bay in the world
- Get active and use your paddling muscles as you kayak through the cool waters
- Delight in a once-in-a-lifetime experience you're sure to never forget

- A 2.5-hour kayaking trip through the glowing bay
- We provide the kayaks, paddles, life vests, insect repellent, and water!
- A friendly and knowledgeable guides
- Optional transportation from one of two convenient pickup locations

- Our kayaks have a weight limit of 500 pounds
- The minimum age is 5 years old

- To tour the Bioluminescent Bay of Vieques (Puerto Mosquito) you'll have to spend the night; (there's no transportation back to the main island after 6pm)
-  Our kayaks are tandem (2 people) 
- The tour is best on a moonless night

entries.name: Kayaking in Vieques' Bioluminescent Bay

blurbs.value: Wonder at the natural power and grace of the sea's biggest inhabitants on an excursion in the Sea of Cortez and the Pacific Ocean guided by a marine biologist. Keep your eyes peeled for gray, humpback and blue whales.

- Watch as blue, gray and humpback whales dive out of the water and create a huge splash
- Get a look under the water with live video from below the surface, which also lets you hear the whales singing
- Learn about whale behavior from a marine biologist, who teaches you about everything you see on the tour 
- Cruise over the emerald waters of the Sea of Cortez and the Pacific Ocean on a roomy ship to spots where whales are known to be active
- Take a piece of your experience home with a complimentary souvenir photo

- Guided whale-watching trip
- Bottled water and snack
Please bring sunscreen, hat and a sweater.

entries.name: Guided Whale Watching Tour in Cabo San Lucas

blurbs.value: Must cancel at least 48 hours before departure for full refund.

Set sail down Manatee River with this cruise that lets you see the best of Florida. Coast through Terra Ceia and Lower Tampa Bay while listening to a trained ecologist explain the local flora and fauna.

- Enjoy a comfortable cruise ship that is weather protected as you work your way down a number of waterways
- Bring any food or beverages on board that you want to make your excursion as enjoyable as possible
- Marvel at rare and exotic animals that you'll spot from your ship, from manatees to a variety of seagulls
- Gaze at impressive mansions along the banks of Manatee River as you head for Lower Tampa Bay 
- Float past incredible mangrove islands in Terra Ceia Bay as you learn about the history of this recently-restored estuary

- 2 hour guided boat tour of Manatee River and surrounding areas 
- Complimentary bottled water and coolers
This tour requires a minimum of 10 people. Guests should dress in layers and wear sunscreen for maximum comfort while aboard the boat. The boat is equipped with on-board restrooms.

entries.name: Two Hour Manatee River Cruise

blurbs.value: - We require at least 7 days in advance for a full refund.
Hang out with mini pigs for the day during an interactive experience at the farm. Play with them and learn everything there is about pigs, told by an expert!

- Spend some time with adorable mini pigs at a local pig farm, during a fun hands-on experience 
- Get a chance to rub the bellies of these small pigs while making new friends with these cute little creatures 
- Chat with a professional and get any of your questions answered by someone with plenty of knowledge
- Guided pig experience

- The visit will be limited to an hour, so if you're running late please keep in mind that time comes off your hour booking.
- Please wear close-toed shoes to protect your toes, as pigs like to nibble. Additionally, wear clothes you don't mind getting dirty (this is a farm and it's bound to happen).
- We do not have a public restroom on site. There is a Chevron gas station on the corner with a restroom. We ask you please use that facility. The house restroom will be off-limits to visitors

- You will be able to pet, scratch, and play with the adult mini pigs. Any questions you may have will be answered at your visit as well. 
- Please keep in mind, the young piglets will be running around the same area, so you're able to take photos and videos of them and if you are approached by a piglet you're welcome to reach out and try to rub him or her, but we have a strict rule they are not allowed to be chased, held, or picked up as this could potentially lead to a piglet being hurt.

entries.name: Mini Pig Experience in Valley Center, CA

blurbs.value: See you if you can uncover the secret of Area 52 during a thrilling escape room adventure that is rated high in difficulty, make it a fun challenge for escape room lovers.

- Take part in a fun and exciting game, uncovering tough clues to try and escape the mysterious Area 52 room
- Explore the room from top to bottom, and see all of the secrets that reside in its dark corners
 - Get your head in the game and challenge yourself to unlock the secrets of Area 52, a game that only 10% of participants have been able to win

- Area 52 escape room game session 
- Escape room T-shirt
- A discount card for all future bookings

entries.name: Fort Myers Area 52 Escape Room Adventure

blurbs.value:
We understand that sometimes things go wrong and there may be rare cases where you need to reschedule your session. TYF will reschedule or refund your session(s) subject to the table below, and try to get you active again on the date of your choice. Please be aware that programming changes are subject to guide availability and that second choice dates may take time to find:
 - Up to 15 days: 100%
 - 14 days to 8 days: 50%
 - Less than 7 days 0%
An exhilarating blend of scrambling, leaping and traversing along the coastline, where the sea meets the land. There are spots to jump, stretches to swim, caves to explore and waves to navigate.

- Explore the jagged coast of the Pembrokeshire Coast from above and the water below
- Scramble around pristine cliffs swim between rocks and jump from land to sea
- Experience saltwater adventure with the TYF team who pioneered the sport of Coasteering back in the 1980s and have taken over 200,000 people out on adventures
- Ensure your safety through experienced and knowledgeable guides that you get the best possible experience while on your adventure with us

- A friendly and experienced guide
- Helmet to protect your head
- Wetsuit to keep you warm 
- A buoyancy aid to keep you floating.

-Bring a towel and swimsuit. 
-You may also wish to bring a pair of old trainers to wear on the coasteer. If not you are welcome to use a pair from our selection.

entries.name: Explorer Coasteer on Pembrokeshire Coast

blurbs.value: Full refunds for cancellations made at least 24 hours in advance.

Outsmart a pack of pirates with this escape game that pits you against dangerous buccaneers along the shores of Savannah. Put your thinking skills to the test as you solve puzzles and brain teasers with only an hour to spare.

- Match wits with the likes of Captain Hook during an hour-long escape room challenge 
- Race against the clock as you rely on teamwork and your brain to solve puzzles and clues before the hour is up 
- Enjoy the challenge of working with others for a fun and exciting team-building experience
- One-hour escape room challenge
Please, no babies or children under the age of 10.

entries.name: Pirate Escape Adventure in Savannah

blurbs.value: Full refunds for cancellations made at least 48 hours in advance.
Work alongside your teammates to escape from your kidnapper during a thrilling escape game scenario. Find the clues you need to make it out before the hour is up!

- Take part in a wild escape room challenge where you put your wits to the test in a race against the clock
- Rally up your friends for a challenging game that forces you to work together if you want to escape
- Solve puzzles and unlock codes that show you how to break out of the room before your kidnapper comes back
- Escape room game

entries.name: Abducted Escape Room Game in Erie

blurbs.value: Tours take place in rain, wind, sun or SNOW!
Get the creeps on this guided ghost tour of Park City's historic Main Street. Follow your guide to discover the lurking spirits that haunt iconic city landmarks.

- See the hidden side of Park City when you explore its haunted past and present 
- Listen spellbound to your ghosthunting guides as they tell tales of the residents who once lived here and whose ghosts still lurk nearby
- Keep your eyes peeled for a ghostly floating "orb" known to mysteriously appear in photos 
- Stop by top city landmarks specifically chosen for their historical significance and potential haunting
- 90 minute guided walking tour

entries.name: Guided Ghost Tour in Park City

blurbs.value:
- Any cancellation more than 3 days (72 hours) in advance will receive a full refund. 
- If you cancel less than 3 days (72 hours) in advance, there will be no refund or rain check for your payment. 
- If we are not able to book a minimum of 6 seats, the bike will not go out. We will contact you if there are less than 6 seats booked for your time slot! 
- If a ride has to cancel due to this minimum, we will refund your payment if we are unable to reschedule your reservation.
Hop aboard our pedal party bike for our most popular excursion through historic Asbury Park! Enjoy music, great drinks, and good times along the way!

- Enjoy a 2-hour scenic ride as you pedal your way through the beautiful Asbury Park! 
- Stop off at 3 awesome bars along the way and get into the party spirit! 
- Enjoy great tunes and laughs with a group of family or friends as you pedal around Asbury together

- 2-hour pedal party bike tour
- Water bottle for each guest

- Ages 21+ only
- The state of New Jersey does not allow drinking alcohol on board the bike, which is why we've partnered with amazing bars and restaurants that offer great drink specials!

- Feel free to bring snacks to consume on board
- Remember your cash and IDs to ensure you can enjoy a nice cold one at each stop
- The bike will still run in light rain, so come prepared for the weather!
- The bike requires a minimum of 6 people to run

entries.name: Pedal Party Bike Tour in Asbury

blurbs.value:
- No refunds
- Rescheduling needs to take place within three days of your booking
Our signature Wine Tour gives travelers the chance to experience wine country while riding in our newly modified tandem sidecars! Ride in style on the open road and view the scenery in Temecula.

- Learn more about Temecula's famous wineries as you explore the scenic area by sidecar
- Immerse yourself in the city's rich history and culture while tasting some of the best wines in the country
- Visit 2 world-renowned wineries and try their exceptional offerings
- Meet and greet with patrons of some of Temecula's famous wineries to learn about their winery's history and the types of wine they develop

- Guided tour
- Friendly and knowlegable guide
- Visit to 3 amazing wineries
- Wine tastings at 2 world-renowned wineries 
- Private chauffeur experience in your own personal Tandem Sidecar
- Meet and Greet session
- Please drink responsibly

- Please wear comfortable attire and wear sunscreen
- Please also note that gratuities are not included
- We ask that you bring cash to tip your drivers as they do an amazing job providing an unforgettable experience for our guests

entries.name: Sidecar Tour of Temecula's Wine Country

blurbs.value: Head out on a pedal pub crawl for sightseeing in Atlanta with a twist. Expect to roll through four unique bars and sip on your favorite drinks while professional guides show you the hottest spots in the city.

- Experience a super fun ride on a party bike that's the perfect vehicle to use while touring the streets of Atlanta
- Enjoy a fun, memorable, and unconventional touring experience for visitors and locals alike
- Explore unique and quirky bars throughout the city as you travel through downtown, midtown, and the historical districts.
- Feel free to bring your own bottle and snack, enjoying them while aboard the bike
- Guided pedal bike pub crawl

- Must sign liability waiver at booking or before boarding bike.
- No pets. 
- No smoking.
- No glass bottles or containers. 
- Must be 21 or over with ID
No alcohol provided during the tour, but feel free to grab drinks along the way.

entries.name: Pedal-Powered Pub Crawl in Atlanta

blurbs.value:
- Tours booked more than 48 hours must be canceled 24 hours before the activity 
- Tours reserved less than 24 hours must be canceled 2 hours before the activity

Experience the process of our coffee, chocolate and sugar cane tours! Drink and eat all the coffee and chocolate during our tour. At the end you can buy fresh coffee and chocolate from our store after learning about how their grown, produced and ultimately prepared in the final product.

- Peek into the wonderful history of coffee in the world, followed by its history in our country and importance in Costa Rica’s development
- Learn other aspects of Costa Rican culture, as well as some of our traditions
- See all the production processes of naturally-grown coffee, from the seed to the delicious final product, the cup of coffee
- Participate in the chocolate process and enjoy, share and taste the fruit of the cocoa to its magnificent transformation to a delicious drink
- Discover the world of sugar cane, where you’ll learn about its history, plantations, different types of harvest, processing and obtainment of various products 
- Experience handcrafting sugar cane juice yourself

- 2-hour 3-in-1 tour
- English and Spanish-speaking tour guide
- Entrance fees
- Coffee, chocolate and sugar cane tasting

- We are an accessible tour for the whole family
- 100% of our trails are made of concrete, which means that wheelchairs and strollers will have no problem walking around the property

entries.name: 3 In 1 - Coffee, Chocolate and Sugar Cane Tour

blurbs.value: All sales are final, which means no refunds. You may transfer or reschedule your booking with sufficient notice. Rescheduling can be processed up to 48 hours before your booking; there is a $30 rescheduling fee.
Everyone’s favorite Hollywood star, Ruby Valentine, has gone missing. Go to Ruby’s dressing room and find any clues the kidnapper may have left behind to help find Ruby!

- Solve the clues before time runs out
- Fun for friends, families, teams and clubs!
- Created by game lovers, for game lovers
An escape room presents a unique challenge: escape from the room within 60 minutes! To succeed, you will need to use your intelligence, imagination, and creativity.

Our rooms are recommended for ages 8 and up. Parties where members are 15 years or younger must be accompanied by a paying adult. Minors will need to have an adult complete a waiver on their behalf. Unlike many escape rooms, our games are private, meaning we don't pair you with strangers.
Please arrive 15 minutes before your booking time.

entries.name: CSI: Hollywood

blurbs.value: Skim over treetops and fly through the air on a ziplining adventure in Branson, Missouri. Strap in for a wild ride in the heart of the Ozarks, and enjoy six different ziplines for hours of fun.

- Head to Branson, Missouri, a small town nestled near the Ozark mountains
- Fly down six recently renovated zip lines for a thrilling, aerial adventure
- Zoom through a flowing forest on more than 2,700 feet of ziplines
- Don't worry about safety with first-rate gear that ensures you're securely in your harness

- Zipline adventure
- Helmet and harness

Weight requirements of 50-270 lbs. No dangling or loose jewelry items. No skirts. Long hair must be tied back. You must be in moderate to good health, and be able to hike short distances and climb stairs. Please try and wear comfortable clothing in layers. Flip flops and related footwear is not recommended. Tennis shoes or boots is a more comfortable fit for ziplining.

entries.name: Indian Point Zipline Adventure

blurbs.value: Lock and load with this shooting lesson that gets you feeling like a pro after an extensive two-hour course. With all the equipment you need to fire away provided, work with a pro to master the fundamentals of handling weapons.

- Learn the ins and outs of proper shooting and handling with this lesson perfect for gun enthusiasts
- Start off with an informative classroom session led by a pro, before hitting the firing range and seeing what you can do
- Get started right away with all the equipment you need ready and waiting
- Come back throughout the week for some stress-relieving target practice that lets you perfect your aim

- Two-hour beginner shooting package with instructor 
- All equipment, including gun rental 
- One week of shooting practice

entries.name: Two-Hour Beginner Shooting Lesson in Rockville

blurbs.value: Get twice the scare with a combo ghost tour that leads through an old cemetery and beyond. Check out creepy buildings known for their paranormal activity as you see the scary side of Plymouth.

- Take part in a two-hour guided combo tour around Plymouth's spookiest landmarks
- Make you way to two local houses, which were built back in the 1700 and 1800s and are known to be haunted 
- Stroll through the Burial Hill Cemetery, checking out the tombstones of those who passed away years ago 
- Listen to ghost stories of the residents that continue to haunt the area today and why
- Guided combo tout

entries.name: Guided Combo Ghost Tour in Plymouth

blurbs.value: Get an inside look at the heart of Mexico City on a guided tour through centuries of history. Immerse yourself in the local culture as your English-speaking guide regales you with entertaining stories.

- Take a stroll around Mexico City to uncover the rich history and thriving culture throughout the city
- Get an up-close look at local neighborhoods as you listen to stories about the famous landmarks you pass
- Walk through charming streets and blossoming gardens with a professional guide, who knows where to find the best hidden gems
- Guided walking tour in English

entries.name: Free Downtown Walking Tour of Mexico City in English

blurbs.value: Full refunds for cancellations made at least 48 hours in advance.
Set off on a guided food tour around Jordaan. Follow along with a local who will show you the best places to eat and drink in the area.

- Enjoy a guided four-hour food tour around Jordaan in Amsterdam, led by a professional 
- Stroll along the charming streets where you'll check out both cultural and historical landmarks and more
- Weave in and out of various eateries and restaurants, getting plenty Dutch tastings that will fill you up like a meal

- Guided food tour
- Tastings

entries.name: 3.5-Hour Jordaan Food Tour

blurbs.value: - Full refunds for cancellations made at least 7 days in advance.
Relaxing horseback experience with time on the bluff watching the sun go down on our beautiful ranch.

- Set off on a two-hour guided horseback ride, getting a chance to explore the great outdoors with a gentle creature 
- Check out the Brazos River Valley from a unique view like never before as you head through shaded hardwood forests and trot along grassy hills 
- Have fun on a horseback ride that is ideal for all skill levels and ages, making it a fun family experience

- Guided horseback ride
- Water
- Arrive 10 minutes early

entries.name: The Lone Star's 2-Hour Sunset Horse Ride in Waco

blurbs.value: Head to an Amish farm at milking time to meet the farmer, plus visit with local craftsman. Chat with an Amish family in their home for an informative experience.

- Enter an Amish barn to learn about the milking process firsthand, which is surprisingly not done by hand
- Discover how milk is kept cold in the bulk tank with “Amish electricity”
- See how local Amish businesses make everything from gazebos and furniture to farm equipment and quilts
- Travel down scenic backroads to a distant farm in the countryside for a friendly conversation

- Amish visit
- Friendly guide
- No children under six years old.

entries.name: Amish Visit-in-Person Tour in Bird in Hand

blurbs.value: Cancellations can be made within 24 hours of your start time.
Cast away into waters teeming with local fish for hours of fishing fun along the shores of Florida. Team up with friendly crew, who have years of experience in these waters.

- Come aboard a classic, custom-built Whiticar, a spacious cruiser with plenty of room for you to fish comfortably 
- Work with a staff of captains and mates, who have plenty of experience in Gulfstream waters 
- Reel in local catches, including sailfish, dolphins, king mackerel, and tuna
- Bask in the bright sun and cool breeze as you relax, waiting for a prize catch to tug at your line
- 4-hour shared fishing charter

entries.name: Four-Hour Shared Fishing Charter in Deerfield Beach

blurbs.value: Full refunds for cancellations made at least 24 hours in advance.
Enjoy a forty-five-minute ferry ride on the Cooper River from Hilton Head to Daufuskie Island. See the sights as you feel the breeze in your hair.

- Head out on a guided ferry ride leaving Buckingham Landing and making its way to Hilton Head
- Check out the scenic sights along the way, while a professional points of various points of interest 
- Hear stories about the area's rich history and more, all told by someone with lots of insider knowledge
- Guided ferry ride

entries.name: Ferry Departing Buckingham Landing  on Hilton Head

blurbs.value: Create your own paperweight during a hands-on class where you work with friendly instructors. Learn the fundamentals of using a hot glass furnace, then take home a piece to show off.

- Have some fun during a unique, hands-on experience with a one-hour introductory class perfect for up to two people 
- Learn how to manipulate hot glass using the furnace glass blowing technique with the help of a friendly instructor
- Use crushed colored glass to create a paperweight, which you take home to show off to your friends and family
- Paperweight-making class

Glass cools overnight in a kiln and is not available until the following day after 3:30pm. We also offer shipping for an additional fee. Please bring a bottle of water or a beverage to stay hydrated during your class. Dress in layers as the temperature in our studio varies. Closed-toe shoes are required in the studio. The minimum age to participate is 12 years old.

entries.name: Paperweight Making Class in Duluth

blurbs.value: All sales are final, which means no refunds. You may transfer or reschedule your booking with sufficient notice. Rescheduling can be processed up to 48 hours before your booking; there is a $30 rescheduling fee.
One of your friends has been working on a top secret physics project: a time portal! The good news is that it works! The bad news is that your friend has gotten trapped in time - can you save him?

- Solve the clues before time runs out
- Fun for friends, families, teams and clubs
- Created by game lovers, for game lovers
An escape room presents a unique challenge: escape from the room within 60 minutes! To succeed, you will need to use your intelligence, imagination, and creativity.

Our rooms are recommended for ages 8 and up. Parties where members are 15 years or younger must be accompanied by a paying adult. Minors will need to have an adult complete a waiver on their behalf. Unlike many escape rooms, our games are private, meaning we don't pair you with strangers.
Please arrive 15 minutes before your booking time.

entries.name: Trapped in Time

blurbs.value: Full refunds for cancellations made at least 7 days in advance.
Step aboard a classic sailing yacht for an unforgettable tour over San Diego's shimmering waters. Feel the sun on your face as you breathe in the fresh salty air.

- Hear the sea splashing against the hull and the wind in the sails as you speed over sparkling waves
- See San Diego from a new perspective, catching the city skyline from the water as you make new memories with your friends and loved ones
- Enjoy chilled white wine, ice cold beer, or champagne on an intimate two-hour venture
- Watch the sun set below the peninsula of Point Loma, creating a spectacular array of light on the water

- Two-hour sailing tour
- Round of champagne, beer, or white wine
- Unlimited soda, water, chips, and snacks
- Platter of salami, cheese, and crackers

entries.name: Two-Hour Sunset Sailing Tour in San Diego

blurbs.value: No refunds for cancelled bookings
Explore the Grand Canyon's caverns with a tour inside an underground elevator. See these massive formations up-close to marvel at the unforgettable beauty of this national landmark.

- Experience the adventure as you explore the Grand Canyon's Caverns, the largest of its kind in the entire country.
- Kick off your tour with an elevator ride 210 feet below the surface 
- Journey through the "Chapel of the Ages",  "Ancient Water Ways", " Snowball Palace", "The Mystery Room" and through "The Halls of Gold".
- Join the "Ghost Tour" when we turn off ALL the Lights and the Cavern Spirts come to life.

- Guided 45-minute tour
- Short Tour available
- Proper walking or hiking shoes are required to participate

- Pathways are paved, there are inclines to climb and stairs to descend on the way out.
- Temperature is a constant 58-60 degrees

entries.name: Underground Cavern Tour at Peach Springs

blurbs.value: Parties of five or more require four days advance notice to be eligible for a refund; groups under five must give at least 48 hours notice.
Hop on a trolley with a bottle or six pack of your choice for a storytelling adventure through Philadelphia. Discover the City of Brotherly Love as you uncover all of the city's major attractions.

- Take a trolley tour around Philadelphia's most notable landmarks—with option to bring your own alcohol onto the trolley
- Get insider knowledge about several historic sites around Philly, including the Liberty Bell, City Hall and the Philadelphia Museum of Art, made famous in the Rocky films
Stop in at significant sites, such as Boathouse Row and the Valley of Heroes
- Learn about the integral role Old City played in the American Revolution
- Guided trolley tour
This tour is BYOB for those guests 21 and over. A valid ID showing proof of age is required to bring and consume alcohol on the bus.

entries.name: BYOB Trolley Tour in Philadelphia

blurbs.value: - Tours operate rain or shine and are non-refundable.

Check out San Francisco's only Legacy Business Tour Company celebrating "30" years of walking with Pride! Enjoy the most comprehensive LGBTQ tour in the world with twice as many tour sites by a local resident and activist.

- Enjoy an empowering and easy two-hour walking tour through the Castro neighborhood, the largest Lesbian, Gay, Bi-sexual, Transgender, Queer community in the world!
- Explore a sexual & gender diverse culture as you visit over 20 historical LGBTQ sites 
 - Walk alongside a professional who is a licensed tour guide, a local resident of 20 years, and a community and LGBTQ civil rights activist

- Two-hour historical walking tour of the Castro neighborhood
- Say hello to the neighbors too!

- The tour route is easy with no large hills.
- Public walkways and restrooms are handicap accessible.
- Tours include adult and sexual content, so parental discretion is advised.
- We operate rain or shine!

entries.name: LGBTQ Castro Tour in San Francisco

blurbs.value:
- Cancellation of a confirmed reservation can only be done up till 24 hours in advance of the start of the Dolphin program, and can be done by (in)direct phone contact or email contact. 
- The cancellation is only valid after confirmation. 
- For any cancellations that occur within 24 hours before the start of the program, the full amount of the cost for the reserved Dolphin program will be charged. 
- Please be on time! If you arrive too late, your reservation will be cancelled and your credit-card will be charged for the full amount.
Gently pet a dolphin who will give you a kiss and a handshake while standing in a refreshing pool!

- Meet friendly and playful dolphins
- The trainer will teach you all about the dolphin's behaviors and anatomy
- The Dolphin Encounter is an intimate and interactive experience, which lasts for approximately 15-20 minutes
- The aquarium ticket is included in your Dolphin Experience. Please make sure to bring your confirmation when you enter the aquarium to be eligible.

- Group size maximum of 6 people per 1 dolphin
- A full paying adult per child is required

- Cameras are allowed, but NOT in the water
- Adults typically stand in thigh to waist-deep water, while small children are at shoulder-depth. Toddlers and babies must be held by their parents
- It is possible for family and friends to take photographs from our observation areas, however participants may not bring a camera into the water
- Please bring along a bathing suit, a towel, and sun block
- This program is accessible for people with special needs, however consultation is required prior to reservation

entries.name: Dolphin Encounter at Bapor Kibrá, Curaçao

blurbs.value: Learn the techniques behind smoking and grilling meats with guided instruction. Take this six-hour class to go over the methods, and pick up plenty of pro tips along the way.

- Master the art of smoking meats while using different types of pellet smokers including Traeger, Grilla, One Big Easy, One Big Green Egg, and propane gas grills
- Smoke a variety of different meat in class, including pulled pork, pork tenderloin, brisket, chicken, and buffalo wings
- Feel free to bring your own beverages, such as water, soda, beer, or wine to enjoy with your food after the class is finished
- Six-hour cooking class

entries.name: 6-Hour Smoking & Grilling Cooking Class

blurbs.value: Please note that 50% of your payment is non-refundable. You also acknowledge there will be a $40 rescheduling fee applied if you reschedule within 5 days of the class date. Exceptions include if LSAG needs to cancel the class or we/you can find someone to take your place in the class.
Create a unique, custom wine goblet, martini, or champagne glass stem as you learn to manipulate hot glass. Later, enjoy a glass of complimentary wine while we assemble your goblet.

- Partake in an glassblowing class that is ideal for beginners who have little to no experience 
- Spend ninety-minutes in a flameworking class where you'll pick up beginner techniques and more
- Make a unique, custom wine goblet stem as you learn to manipulate hot glass
- Toast to your new skills after class with a glass of wine while the professional staff assembles your goblet

- Guided class
- All materials and supplies
- One glass of wine

- Please wear closed-toe shoes
- Dress in layers
- Bring a water bottle

entries.name: Wine Goblet Making Class

blurbs.value: All sales are final. Once you are booked, there are no refunds. No-shows are also non-refundable.
Set off on a private fishing adventure to reel in big catches during four hours of fun and relaxation. Cruise over Florida's blue waters at your own pace as you cast away and enjoy the warm weather.

- Have some fun under the sun with a private fishing charter that lets you enjoy the tropics in peace
- Come aboard a custom-designed 50' fishing boat built for comfort and mobility
- Search out big game fish, including mahi, tuna, wahoo and possibly sharks
- Enjoy the taste of your catch when a local restaurant cooks up your fresh fish after you head back to land

- Four-hour private fishing charter
- Bait and tackle
- The price is for one charter that can hold up to 6 people.

entries.name: Private Four-Hour Big Game Fishing Trip in Hollywood

blurbs.value:
- All cancellations must be made within 48 hours of purchase date in order to receive a full refund
- All packages are transferable upon request
Prepare for an animal lover’s dream tour - come meet and play with several exotic species including; feline cubs, primates, sloths, and much more!

- Meet and play with a wide range of animals while learning about their habitats and worldwide conservation efforts
- Experience a 1-hour private guided tour of our zoo 
- 5-minute interaction with our feline cubs
- 1-hour tour offering a one-of-a-kind play session with three types of our baby primates
- 5-minute one-on-one experience with a sloth
- 10-minute session where you’ll get the thrill of having an owl perch right on your arm

- General Wildlife Experience: 
A 1-hour private guided tour of our zoo. You'll have a truly up close and personal experience with a variety of our resident animals while also getting the chance to tour our multi-acre facility.

Guests will see animals ranging from primates to reptiles, lions, tigers and rare birds, and even get to interact with a monkey, and some of our smaller birds and reptiles.
- Guests must be at least 4 feet tall to participate in this experience

- Please be sure to wear comfortable clothing and footwear
- Guests may not wear jewelry, this is to ensure the safety of the animals
- Bring water and your camera

entries.name: Special Wildlife Experience in Miami

blurbs.value: Full refunds for cancellations made at least one week in advance.
Glide down the Tar River on board a river tube with comfortable back support so you can focus on the relaxation. Soak up some sun as you float along peacefully, gazing over the lush shores.

- Have some fun on the river with a relaxing tubing trip that lets you make the most of your time outdoors
- Snag a tube that's equipped with a comfy backrest for peaceful floating: Kick back and soak up the sun
- Place your drink of choice in the tube's cup holder for cooling refreshment that's just a few inches away
- Choose to add a cooler to keep your beverages cool and to pack a picnic lunch to enjoy along the shore
- Tubing adventure

entries.name: Tar River Tube Rental in Bunn

blurbs.value: Get a true Florida experience on this guided half-day tour that includes time on an airboat through the Everglades and a trip to the Chomp House Grill for authentic southern BBQ.

- See Florida's amazing wildlife—get great views of alligators, turtles, eagles, great blue herons and much more
- Visit a tropical bird aviary and explore the cypress-filled wetlands of Central Florida
- Wake up your taste buds at the Chomp House Grill with authentic Florida BBQ

- One-hour guided airboat tour
- BBQ lunch basket
- Photo souvenirs

entries.name: Kenansville Florida Half-Day Adventure Package

blurbs.value: Race the clock with your team during this escape game adventure. Solve puzzles, riddles, and other obstacles to trap a Cornish Pixie as it terrorizes the school in this Harry Potter-inspired adventure.

- Take part in a fun Harry Potter-inspired escape room game with your friends, challenging yourself and those around you to the fullest 
- Solve hard brain teasers and unlock hidden clues, all in an effort to find a way to keep a Cornish Pixie away from others 
- Race against the clock, trying your best to determine the right solution with only an hour to spare
- Escape room game
Room capacity is up to 10 people. If you do not book out the entire room, you may be paired with another group

- Please plan to arrive 15 minutes early. 
- Please note: while this room is suitable for all ages, children under 13 may find it very difficult

entries.name: The Academy of Witchcraft & Wizardry

blurbs.value: Explore a massive nature preserve that’s full of Florida's native creatures, including giant alligators and tropical birds, plus animals from afar, such as zebras and watusi.

- Explore an expertly maintained park full of exotic animals such as zebras, watusi, white-tailed deer, water buffalo, emu, wild boar, zebu and giant alligators
- Stroll through a tropical bird aviary and enjoy a hands-on alligator demonstration
- Walk along the stunning Hawk Swamp Boardwalk—a pristine section of the Florida swamp ecosystem—and take in fantastic views from a 500-foot-high sightseeing deck
- Dine at the delicious onsite barbecue restaurant (cost of food not included)

- Hands on Gator Handling Demo
- Dress appropriately for the weather

entries.name: Everglades Wildlife Park Admission

blurbs.value:
- We do not offer refunds for no-shows or cancellations
- However, for up to 3 months from your original booking date, you may reschedule your appointment
- Due to the preparation needed to ensure you have the best experience possible, we ask that you reschedule or cancel at least 24 hours before the beginning of your appointment, should the need arise

Unleash your rage and have a smashing good time with this cathartic smash room experience! Bring along a friend as the pair of you smash up a range of items and release any pent-up stress in a safe and fun environment

- Relieve yourself of stress and have a blast with this unique smash room experience!
- Bring a friend and armour up as the 2 of you head into a room where you can smash anything you like! 
- Choose your own music and let loose on a variety of different smashable items 
- Leave feeling energized and de-stressed, and let us clean up the mess!

- Cool and welcoming environment
- Great selection of smashables
- Amazing selection of add-ons to smash
- Awesome armoury weapons
- Super friendly staff
- Complimentary water after session
- Free parking

- Persons under the age of 12 may not participate
- Persons from 12-16 years of age may participate with the signed waiver consent of a legal parent or guardian and with their parent/guardian present during the event
- Any person aged 17-18 may participate without a parent or Guardian present, but their Parent or Guardian must sign the waiver prior to the commencement of the event

- This activity is for up to 2 participants
- Smash room will include: 
- 8 Small items (cups, glass, small plates, cassettes) 
- 8 medium Items (VHS Tape, vase, large plate, large bowl) 
- 3 Electronics (TV box, VCR, DVD players, stereo, speaker, fan)

entries.name: Double Trouble Smash Room Experience for 2 in Ottawa

blurbs.value: Get up-close and personal with a sloth during a VIP encounter that you'll never forget. Plus, see plenty of other wildlife from the jungle and pampas of South America.

- Take part in a guided VIP zoo adventure that's led by a professional with years of experience 
- Enjoy a small group session that offers a one-on-one encounter with a friendly sloth, who you're able to feed and hold
- Explore this South American zoo exhibit to its entirety, checking out the iguanas and birds 
- Learn all about these animals from someone with plenty of insider knowledge
- Guided sloth experience

entries.name: VIP Sloth Encounter in Orlando

blurbs.value: Must call in 24 hours in advance prior to time of axe throwing session to receive a full refund.
Purchase an hour session of axe throwing and create a ruckus with this fun activity! Axe throwing is perfect for anyone needing to relieve some stress or just wanting to have a good time with pals!

- Enjoy an hour of releasing bottled-up stress or simply having a great time with your friends
- Benefit from guided training to make the most of your throw time
- Get a satisfying arm workout as well an entertaining experience

- Set-up and brief training
- 1-hour axe-throwing session
- No age restrictions, but anyone under 18 must have a waiver signed by parent/legal guardian
- Please fill out the waiver prior to your session for a smoother process

entries.name: 1-Hour Axe Throwing Session in Syracuse

blurbs.value:
- If you arrive late, you will not have the full time to play, as the end time does not change
- No refunds are issued for late, missed, or canceled games

While hiking through the hills of the North Georgia Mountains, you suddenly realized you are lost. You spot an old cabin in the woods and decide to knock on the door. Old Man Tiller answers and invites you in for a drink. He then steps out to tend his fire and locks the door. You have one hour to escape before Old Man Tiller returns!

- Experience an exhilarating escape room created by our team of designers and game masters that is perfect for families, friends, and co-workers
- Put your wits to the test as you strategize a plan to escape the nefarious Old Man Tiller
- Use your imagination to find the best way to make your escape with your teammates

- Escape room
- Knowledgeable and friendly staff

- If your party contains less than 8 people, then you may be placed with other people
- No photography is allowed inside the escape rooms

- Please arrive 15 minutes prior to your scheduled game time for instructions on how to play the game 
- Children under the age of 14 must be accompanied by an adult
- Children under the age of 16 must have a parent or guardian complete a waiver upon arrival

entries.name: Cabin In The Woods Escape Room in Helen, GA

blurbs.value: Full refunds for cancellations made at least 72 hours in advance.
Cruise through Downtown Kelowna’s cultural and brewery districts on a wile biking adventure. Hit up three memorable destinations where you'll sip on drinks and more.

- Head out to three local breweries in Downtown Kelowna, led by a professional 
- Opt for cider and wine that is also available with various partners if you're not big beer drinkers 
- Get hooked up with exclusive features and discounts from our partners along the route

- Two-hour tour
- If beer isn't your thing, wine and cider are available at select stops

Drinking is not permitted aboard the Smile Cycle Tours big bike. If we are not able to book a minimum of 8 seats on your tour, the bike will not go out (for physical reasons of pedalling the bike). We will contact you if there are less than 8 seats booked for your time slot.

Plenty of storage available on board. All tours start and end at Central restaurant, located on 1155 Ellis Street. Don’t wait until we're sold out; all tours are 100% refundable up to 72 hours before your activity. Wear comfy pedaling footwear.

entries.name: Downtown Kelowna Brewery & Bike Tour

blurbs.value: Head out around Salem on a guided ghost tour.  Learn about this historic "Witch City" and why it's still so spooky today.

- Set off on a guided ghost tour around Salem, led by a professional who has plenty of experience 
- Stroll along with paths that are only lit by lanterns as you explore the truth behind this "Witch City"
- Hear stories about the area's past, including those of documented paranormal activity and murder that dates back for years
- Guided ghost tour
- Children must be accompanied by an adult

- Operates in all weather conditions, so please dress appropriately
- Under 6s go free
- Wheelchair accessible

entries.name: Evening Haunted Footsteps Ghost Tour in Salem

blurbs.value: Embrace the quirky charm that defines San Francisco. See some of the City by the Bay's most iconic and historic sights—including Union Square, the St. Francis Hotel and more—guided by Emperor Norton I, San Francisco's unofficial mascot.

- Meet one of the most colorful characters central to the quirky history of San Francisco, self-proclaimed "Protector of Mexico," Emperor Norton I 
- Follow your entertaining Emperor-dressed guide on an interactive sightseeing tour filled with historical anecdotes from his life
- Gain a unique perspective on the earthquake and great fire of 1906, and other historical events that shaped San Francisco 
- Visit and learn the stories behind Union Square, the St. Francis Hotel, Maiden Lane, Lotta’s Fountain, Bummer and Lazarus, the Palace Hotel, Jackson Square, Portsmouth Square, and the Barbary Coast
- 1 hour walking tour of San Francisco with costumed guide
Bring water and wear comfortable walking shoes.

entries.name: Classic Walking Tour of San Francisco with Emperor Norton

blurbs.value: Charge through the dirt trails on our legendary tour, taking in the sights of local landmarks, making stops at both the iconic must-sees and the hidden gems most tourists don't know about.

- Ride in comfort and style in an open-air safari jeep that feels like a breezy patio on wheels that can conquer any terrain
- Embark on a tour led by a local expert as you drive by must-sees stops for photo opportunities at the best sites
- Experience lush parks with ancient arches and petroglyphs dating way back to the Anasazi people
- Get exclusive insider access to Sun's Eye Arch, Ear of the Wind, and Big Hogan, that only your guide can provide
- 2.5 hour guided tour

entries.name: 2.5 Hour  Monument Valley Scenic Tour

blurbs.value: Cancellations with less than a 24 hour notice are not eligible for a refund.
Tradition and elegance fill the Garden District: Join our stroll through this celebrity stomping ground and discover the secret history of New Orleans' upper-class!

- Learn the inside story of authors, poets, movie stars, artists, and sports legends such as Anne Rice, John Goodman and Archie Manning, as you explore their neck of the woods on this lively tour.
- Enjoy the towering Southern Live Oak trees, magnificent Crepe Myrtles, and the stunning fairy-tale-esque Magnolias. 
- Visit the oldest Municipal Cemetery in New Orleans, Lafayette #1 - the site of filming for many famous movies and TV shows including Interview with a Vampire and Double Jeopardy.
- Learn about the rich history of the area and how it fits into the overall story of New Orleans.
- An entertaining 2 hour guided tour led by our brilliant historians

- The walking distance for all tours is about one mile. This is taken at a leisurely pace and over the length of the tour.
- Our tours run, rain or shine! Bring an umbrella if the forecast looks wet!

entries.name: The Secrets of New Orleans' Garden District Tour

blurbs.value: - We have a 24-Hour Cancellation Policy

Surprise your sweetheart with a magical journey on one of our custom Austrian horse-drawn sleighs. Enjoy the winter wonderland as the sleigh bells jingle, skaters glide past on our outdoor Victorian skate park, and the majestic snow-capped mountains surround you.

- Create romance with your sweetheart on a traditional horse-drawn sleigh
- Take in the sights of a winter wonderland at its best along a ride around an elegant Victorian estate
- Sip champagne or cider together as you cozy up under a thick fur blanket
- Warm up in our fully enclosed warming center, sipping hot chocolate by the fire or roast marshmallows on one of our many outdoor fire-pits
- Share a heartfelt experience together that you'll never forget

- 30-minute sleigh ride around a historical Victorian estate
- Fur blankets to keep cozy during the ride
- Complimentary champagne or cider to sip on with your special someone

- Please arrive 20 minutes before departure time
- Our sleighs are equipped with wheels so the rides will be possible even if there is no snow

entries.name: Romantic Sleigh Ride for Two in Jackson

blurbs.value: Full refunds for cancellations made at least 48 hours in advance.
Hop on the shuttle van in the morning to Tahoe Meadows where you'll ride the Tahoe Rim Trail. Ride 14-miles to 40-miles and end back at the bike shop and Tunnel Creek Café.

- Set off on the shuttle in the morning bike rental shop behind Tunnel Creek Café to Spooner Lake State Park 
- Hop off at one of the trail rides ranging from 14 miles to 40 miles and bike your way back to your car
-  Enjoy a beer and a bite at our delicious café after you finish your ride!

- Shuttle service
- $2 entry fee to State Park included in shuttle price

- Coming from South Lake Tahoe? Drive to Spooner Lake in the State Park and ride first, then take an afternoon shuttle back to Spooner. This will help you avoid the busy east shore by Sand Harbor in the morning. 
- The classic Flume Trail Ride is 14 miles back to the shop/cafe and your car. Longer loops can be added
- We drop you off at the trailhead in the State Park and you ride back to our shop - NO riding on Highway 28 to get back to the shop

entries.name: Morning Tahoe Rim Trail Shuttle

blurbs.value:
- Customers will receive a 85% refund if they cancel one week prior to your scheduled route
- No refunds are offered if they cancel less than a week before the tour
- However, if we are able to fill the spot with another group, we will offer a 85% refund – the sooner we know, more likely we will be able to fill the spot
- If you do not show up for the scheduled route, you will be charged in full

Join a funfilled pedal pub tour of Downtown Davenport and see the river renaissance it's experiencing - all while meeting new friends and sipping a cold one! Booking individual seats is great for single-riders, date nights, and small groups!

- Experience the fun of unique and laughter-filled pedal pub tours
- Join the fun of a healthy activity all while indulging your cravings for a cold brew
- Stop at a few of the city's best pubs and breweries to try their specialties
- Tour Downtown and get a unique view of its river renaissance
- Meet new friends during this exciting activity

- 1 seat (on a 16-person party bike)
- 2 hours of fun in Davenport
- 2-3 stops at local establishments
- Drink specials at select bars

- Riders must be ages 21+
- All riders must provide photo ID at the time of the tour
- Each must read and sign the Pedal Pub® Release of Liability Waiver
- Complete the e-waiver prior to your date
- Arrive at least 15 minutes early
- Do not show up drunk (we cannot allow you onboard)
- Do not bring hard alcohol on board (it’s illegal)
- Bring the right amount of beverages (2-3 drinks per person)
- Always drink responsibly and be respectful
- Always listen to your Pilot

- Bring water and snacks
- Bring a fully-charged phone
- Have a pick-up plan for when your tour ends

entries.name: Individual Seat on Pedal Pub Tour of Downtown Davenport
